channel.title: AIoT Group on Jianfei Yang (Rocky)

item.title: Group
item.description: Hiring Ph.D. I am hiring Ph.D. students and CSC visiting students regarding the following research topics: Deep learning empowered AIoT sensing Transfer learning for data-efficient sensing Multimodal LLM for IoT The candidates are expected to have solid backgrounds on machine learning, deep learning or [wireless sensing]. Please drop an email to me with the title “PhD Application + [Name]”. Only the qualified candidates will be contacted.
